title: Shark Bait
summaries: The Shark Bait is a pet-summoning item that summons a pet Shark Pup. It can be found in Water Chests and Ocean/Seaside Crates.
When underwater, the Shark Pup swims around freely. When out of water, it is encased in a bubble. When the player is too far away, the Shark Pup will move swiftly toward them.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a Shark Pup
'Doo, doo, doo, doo, doo, doo'
statistics.Sell: 1 GC
